TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed OverScrollMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates values returned by several types.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.OverScrollMode Always = int32(0)

summary.para: Always allow a user to over-scroll this view, provided it is a view that can scroll.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.OverScrollMode IfContentScrolls = int32(1)

summary.para: Allow a user to over-scroll this view only if the content is large enough to meaningfully scroll, provided it is a view that can scroll.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Views.OverScrollMode Never = int32(2)

summary.para: Never allow a user to over-scroll this view.
